title: (WHEN) Patch 7.19 release? & w-kingdoms azir
body:
Will patch 7.19 containing the azir rework come out before, during or after worlds?

AND WHEN IS THE SOONEST TIME that warring kingdoms azir will become available again?

replies.body:
Warring Kingdoms Azir is part of the annual Lunar Revel event and accompanying skins line. Some are permanent and others are legacy. The legacy ones are only available one patch a year during the annual Lunar Revel event. It usually coincides pretty closely with the Chinese New Year. 
_more info here: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Lunar_Revel_
